channel.title: Need help with a few dodian commands
channel.description: Could someone help me...all of my trys at making a dodian command that gives premium/mod/admin havent worked...on my server im making paying for premium a one time thing and well...i wanted to make a command like ::giveprem but all of mine have been /FAIL LOL

item.title: Need help with a few dodian commands
item.dc:creator: @Goddess Goddess
item.description:
@Goddess wrote:

ok that kinda helps…but would that require the players name or their login number client id thing?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a few dodian commands

item.title: Need help with a few dodian commands
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

if(command.toLowerCase().startsWith("giveprem") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Goddess")) { String noob = command.substring(9); int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(noob); if(index != -1) { client halp = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index]; halp.isMember = true; // replace this with your membership variable. sendMessage("You have given "+halp.playerName+"premium status!"); halp.sendMessage(playerName+" has given you premium status!"); } }

You should be able to make the other commands by basing them on this one.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a few dodian commands
